title: 1999년 Dombeck 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Dombeck. 판결일: 1999-08-09. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: COLORADO ENVIRONMENTAL COALITION; Defenders of Wildlife; Wilderness Society; Sierra Club; Sinapu; Southern Rockies Ecosystem Project; Anne Vickery, Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. Michael DOMBECK, in His Official Capacity as Chief of the United States Forest Service; Lyle K. Laverty, in His Official Capacity as Regional Forester of the Rocky Mountain Region; Martha Kettele, in Her Official Capacity as Supervisor of the White River National Forest; United States Forest Service, Defendants-Appellees. Vail Associates, Inc., Intervenor-Appellee
**판결일**: 1999-08-09
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Brorby, Henry, Seymour

## 변호인

Edward B. Zukoski (Richard E. Condit of Land and Water Fund of the Rockies, Boulder, Colorado, and Stephen D. Harris of Merrill, Anderson, King & Harris, Colorado Springs, Colorado, with him on the briefs for Colorado Environmental Coalition, Defenders of Wildlife, The Wilderness Society, Sinapu, Southern Rockies Ecosystem Project, and Anne Vickery; Gretchen Biggs, Boulder, Colorado, with him on the briefs for Sierra Club), of Land and Water Fund of the Rockies, Boulder, Colorado, for Plaintiffs

## 인용

- 185 F.3d 1162

## 판결문 요약

185 F.3d 1162 (10th Cir. 1999)
    COLORADO ENVIRONMENTAL COALITION; DEFENDERS OF WILDLIFE; WILDERNESS SOCIETY; SIERRA CLUB; SINAPU; SOUTHERN ROCKIES ECOSYSTEM PROJECT; ANNE VICKERY, Plaintiffs-Appellants,v.MICHAEL DOMBECK, in his official capacity asChief of the United States Forest Service; LYLE K. LAVERTY, in his official capacity as Regional Forester of the Rocky Mountain Region; MARTHA KETTELE, in her official capacity as Supervisor of the White River National Forest; UNITED STATES FOREST SERVICE, Defendants-Appellees.VAIL ASSOCIATES, INC., Intervenor-Appellee.
    No. 98-1379
    UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS TENTH CIRCUIT
    August 9, 1999
    
      Appeal from the United States District Court for the District of Colorado. D.C. No. 98-N-1276[Copyrighted Material Omitted][Copyrighted Material Omitted]

Harris of Merrill, Anderson, King & Harris, Colorado Springs, Colorado, with him on the briefs for Colorado Environmental Coalition, Defenders of Wildlife, The Wilderness Society, Sinapu, Southern Rockies Ecosystem Project, and Anne Vickery; Gretchen Biggs, Boulder, Colorado, with him on the briefs for Sierra Club), of Land and Water Fund of the Rockies, Boulder, Colorado, for Plaintiffs-Appellants.
